subject: ATTENTION DEAR:
body:
ATTENTION DEAR:
Regarding the release of your funds. Your payment file was brought to my office and after going through the process and arrangement of your FUNDS RELEASE, This FUND we are talking about is the sum of $2.5Million USD only. It was arranged to be sent to you through account to account TRANSFER / ATM CREDIT CARD DELIVERY/ CONSIGNMENT BOX DELIVERY.
Now You have to choose one option on how you want to receive your FUNDS.
(1) TRANSFER (WIRE)cost $70
(2) CONSIGNMENT BOX DELIVERY. cost $50
(3) ATM CREDIT CARD DELIVERY. cost $25
Choose above listed process for your fund release to you.
Furthermore : You have to bear in mind that each option required good processing with TRUST and HONEST. I shall be expecting to hear from you
as soon as possible for immediate release of your FUNDS.
Thanks.
My Regards.

subject: Re:  ATTENTION DEAR:
body:
Hello,

Thank you for reaching out to me regarding the release of my funds. I appreciate your assistance in this matter. I would like to know more about the options you mentioned for receiving the funds.

1. Could you please provide more details about the transfer wire option? How long does it usually take for the funds to be transferred? Are there any fees associated with this method?

2. For box delivery, how secure is this method? Will the package be insured and tracked during transit? Also, what are the estimated delivery times and costs involved?

3. Lastly, could you explain how the ATM credit card delivery works? Is there a limit on how much can be withdrawn from the card at once? Are there any additional charges or fees for using this method?

I look forward to your response so that I can make an informed decision on how to proceed with receiving my funds.

Best wishes,
Nathan
